camera:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssicamera"/>
<sensor create="CameraReader" path="camera.avi">
	
		
	<output channel="video" pin="camera" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>
audio:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiaudio"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<sensor blockInSamples="512" create="WavReader" path="audio.wav">
	
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio"/>
	
	
</sensor>
mouse:
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor blockInSamples="5" create="FileReader" cutoffInSamples="0" offsetInSamples="0" path="cursor">
	
		
	<output channel="file" pin="cursor" sync="0" watch="0"/>
			
	
</sensor>
microsoftkinect:
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssimodel"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<load name="ssimicrosoftkinect"/>
<load name="ssicamera"/>
<sensor create="MicrosoftKinect" nearTrackingMode="true" seatedSkeletonMode="false" showBodyTracking="false" showFaceTracking="false" simpleFaceTracking="false" trackNearestPerson="true">
	
		
	<output channel="rgb" pin="rgb"/>
	
		
	<output channel="depthr" pin="depth"/>
	
		
	<output channel="au" pin="au"/>
	
		
	<output channel="head" pin="head"/>
	
		
	<output channel="skeleton" pin="skel"/>
	
		
	<output channel="face" pin="face"/>
	
	
</sensor>
